column-1.title: Who is it for?
column-1.description: For upper secondary (vmbo-tl, havo and vwo) students who want to practice, understand, and grow. For schools that want to offer personalized learning to students, strengthen test preparation, or easily accommodate short-term absenteeism - without extra workload.

list.item-1: Personal AI tutor - available 24/7 in a safe, shielded environment, without distraction or noise.
list.item-2: Tiny Talks™ explanatory videos - helping students quickly and clearly understand the core of a subject.
list.item-3: Real-time feedback on 100,000+ assignments - immediate practice reinforces understanding.
